message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your turn! I'll be slightly more generous than your previous offer, but this is as high as I'm willing to go.
I'll meet you in the middle of our previous offers
Time is running out, and the money is losing value fast. I'm sticking close to my previous offer. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I'll compromise, but I still want a bigger share
This is my final offer - a 50/50 split. The value is decreasing rapidly, let's end this before we both lose out.
